questionParts: What is the general solution of:
options: y = C₁ e^{x} + C₂ x e^{x}
questions.correctAnswer: y = C₁ e^{x} + C₂ x e^{x}
explanationParts: The characteristic equation is (λ − 1)^2 = 0, giving a repeated root λ = 1.
So the general solution is y = C₁ e^{x} + C₂ x e^{x}.
